author: Tan Lee Meng J:
counsel: R Govintharasah (Gurbani and Co) for the appellant; Yap Yin Soon (Allen and Gledhill) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Conflict of Laws/Natural forum/Appellant signing contracts to work on board ship/Appellant injured on ship/Appellant initiating proceedings in Singapore against respondent shipowner and employer/Whether stay of action should be granted on ground of forum non conveniens/Factors considered by court when determining whether another available forum clearly or distinctly more appropriate existing
